sections.heading: Timing of motions and hearings; consolidation of hearings8-864
sections.text: Timing of motions and hearings; consolidation of hearingsNotwithstanding any other statute, the court may order or permit the filing of a motion for termination or permanent guardianship before the permanency hearing is held, consolidate
